name: The Amazing Adventures of EZ & PZ
name_original: The Amazing Adventures of EZ & PZ
description:
Internship game project for Headstart Technology by students from Taitotalo.

Programmers: Taru Vikström, Turo Väärti, Asmo Majalahti, Janita Korhonen, Jesperi Räty

Art: Sofia Suhonen, Elizabet Halatjan, Joni Kettunen
